This portable cooking appliance usually fetches $283 in full these days after the last four years being on Amazon, despite the $329 MSRP it carries direct from the brand. Discounts over the year have mostly kept costs above $246, though we have seen it go as low as $218 back in September. You’re looking at a $60 markdown here that drops costs down among the best prices we have tracked, landing it $11 above the annual low and $29 above the all-time low last seen in 2024.
